title: Utrecht
summary: Utrecht (/ˈjuːtrɛkt/ YOO-trekt,[6][7] Dutch: [ˈytrɛxt] (listen)) is the fourth-largest city and a municipality of the Netherlands, capital and most populous city of the province of Utrecht. It is located in the eastern corner of the Randstad conurbation, in the very centre of mainland Netherlands; it had a population of 359,355 as of 2021.[8]
